experience: You and Michael both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Dr. DARRELL RICHARDSON, Mission Critical Ops, and 58 others
Live in Tucson?  Want to close more sales?

John Heinrich, President of The Solutions Forum LLC, announced today that Solutions Forum is creating a new subsidiary, CEO to Go.Solutions Forum (www.thesolutionsforum.com) has been providing business peer advisor groups in Arizona and other localities for the last 11 years.John said that the reason for the creation of CEO to Go is fairly simple: rather than asking CEOs to come to meetings with other CEOs over lunch and talk over their challenges, we’ll go to them on a one on one basis. Fees are reasonable, and the goal is to make for company clients much more in sales and profits than they pay us.CEO to Go is also unique in that all three principals, John Heinrich, Michael Bull and Michael Dicarlo, have run companies. The website is www.ceotogo.net.John can be reached at 480-200-5678, or 1-800-716-9626, and the two Mikes phone numbers are on the website.

summary: The power of Planning seems to be more important as time passes.  Business Planning, Retirement Planning, Investment Planning, Estate Planning, Vacation Planning it`s all good.  What with all this planning happening it is no wonder there are so many planning advisors. Please put me on that  list I am a Sales Planner.  I teach Sales to anyone who wishes to learn with an emphasis on planning.Every week starting in November in both, Tucson and Phoenix,  I will be holding sales training events. We look forward to see at one of them.Thank you.Michael DiCarlo
